text: Lake View Terrace is a suburb district in the northeastern part of the San Fernando Valley region of the City of Los Angeles, California. The area hosts a large equestrian community. It is one of the few remaining areas in the city that has private homes zoned for keeping horses. ==References== ==Other websites== * The Foothills Forum * Los Angeles Times, Real Estate section, Neighborly Advice column: "[Lake View Terrace: Where country living sidles up to the city" (12 June 2005)] * Lake View Terrace Improvement Association * Map of Los Angeles neighborhoods Category:Neighborhoods of Los Angeles
title: Lake View Terrace, Los Angeles
